eventDesc: Query by Parameter Requesting an RDY Display Response
description: The QBP_Q15 structure supports a Display Response and contains the MSH, QPD, RCP, and DSC segments.  Its default trigger event is Q15.  A standard or site-defined query may use this trigger event or may specify a unique trigger event value in its Query Profile.  If a unique trigger event value is chosen for a site-defined query, that value must begin with Z.
